actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to authorize a feasibility study relating to the Bartram Trail in Alabama.

summary.text: Authorizes a feasibility study of the Bartram Trail in Alabama with respect to the designation as a national scenic trail under the National Trails System Act. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 1244)

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to authorize a feasibility study relating to the Bartram Trail in Alabama.
